title: Exam paper political science (major)
content:
Sessional Examination, 2025

PSCMAJ 2024 3d semester)

Paper title: Indian Government and politics

Time: 1 hour.

Marks 20

1. Who was the first president of the constituent assembly? 1 MARK

2. How many elected members of the constituent assembly? 1 MARK

3. What do you mean by fundamental rights? 1 MARK

4. Write two fundamental objectives of the Indian constitution. 2 MARK

5. Critically explain the main characteristics of the constitution of India. 5 MARK

Or

Write a short note on the session of Lok Sabha. 5 MARK

6. Discuss the composition, powers and functions of the parliament. 10 MARK

Or,

Write down the significance of the preamble of the constitution of India. 10 MARK

###
